Title: Restoration Robotics
CO_managers: Roth Capital Partners/ Craig-Hallum Capital Group
Business: We are a medical technology company developing and commercializing a robotic device, the ARTAS System, that assists physicians in performing many of the repetitive tasks that are a part of follicular unit extraction surgery, a type of hair restoration procedure. We believe the ARTAS System is the first and only physician-assisted robotic system that can identify and dissect hair follicular units directly from the scalp and create recipient implant sites.
